resources.string:
This app is in it's test phase probably always 
will be in it's test phase. This app is 
solely designed to show the usage of Machine Learning 
Model in medical field and this app contains 
a model that was constructed from the scratch 
and this recognizes presence of Pneunomia 
based on chest-xrays along with the how likely 
it is in terms of percentage. Though trained 
on actual data, this is likely to make mistakes. 
Do not take this as the final verdict and 
go visit a doc with your x-rays. You've been warned.
